name: casteliacone
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures any status ailment and confusion.
short_effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Castelia City’s specialty, soft-serve
ice cream. It heals all the status
problems of a single Pokémon.

ice cream. It heals all the status

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Castelia City’s specialty, soft-serve ice cream.
It can be used once to heal all the status conditions
of a Pokémon.
